title: The Mines of Moria
description: The Mines of Moria are otherwise known as Khazum-Dum or Dwarrowdelf. Moria is a Kingdom which resides beenath the Misty Mountains and is home to a vast population of dwarves who delve deep into its depths to retrieve precious ore.

services.title: Transportation
services.subtitle: There are many ways to get where you're going in Middle Earth, and every mode of transportation takes the scenic route.
